TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class Comparer<T> : System.Collections.Generic.IComparer<T>, System.Collections.IComparer
.class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit Comparer`1<T> extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.IComparer`1<!T>, class System.Collections.IComparer
Public MustInherit Class Comparer(Of T) Implements IComparer, IComparer(Of T)
generic <typename T> public ref class Comparer abstract : System::Collections::Generic::IComparer<T>, System::Collections::IComparer

span.span: The type of objects to compare.

summary.span: 提供基底類別 (Base Class) 用於 泛型介面的實作。

span.span: Provides a base class for implementations of the generic interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生自這個類別提供的自訂實作集合類別搭配使用這類介面和泛型類別。Derive from this class to provide a custom implementation of the interface for use with collection classes such as the and generic classes. 衍生自之間的差異類別，並實作介面如下所示：The difference between deriving from the class and implementing the interface is as follows: - 若要指定如何根據預設應該比較兩個物件，實作您類別中的介面。To specify how two objects should be compared by default, implement the interface in your class. 這可確保排序作業將會使用您提供的預設比較程式碼。This ensures that sort operations will use the default comparison code that you provided. - 若要定義使用而不是預設的比較子的比較子，衍生自類別。To define a comparer to use instead of the default comparer, derive from the class. 然後，您可以採取做為參數的比較子的排序作業中使用這個比較子。You can then use this comparer in sort operations that take a comparer as a parameter. 所傳回的物件屬性使用泛型介面 (`IComparable`在 C# 中，`IComparable(Of T)`在 Visual Basic 中) 來比較兩個物件。The object returned by the property uses the generic interface (`IComparable` in C#, `IComparable(Of T)` in Visual Basic) to compare two objects. 如果型別`T`未實作泛型介面，屬性會傳回使用介面。If type `T` does not implement the generic interface, the property returns a that uses the interface. ## Examples 下列範例衍生類別， `BoxLengthFirst`，從類別。The following example derives a class, `BoxLengthFirst`, from the class. 這個比較子來比較兩個物件的型別`Box`。This comparer compares two objects of type `Box`. 它首先會排序其長度，然後依高度和寬度。It sorts them first by length, then by height, and then by width. `Box`類別會實作介面，以控制預設比較兩個`Box`物件。The `Box` class implements the interface to control the default comparison between two `Box` objects. 這個預設實作先排序的高度，則依長度，和寬度。This default implementation sorts first by height, then by length, and then by width. 此範例顯示兩個比較所排序的清單之間的差異`Box`物件第一次使用`BoxLengthFirst`比較子，然後藉由使用預設比較子。The example shows the differences between the two comparisons by sorting a list of `Box` objects first by using the `BoxLengthFirst` comparer and then by using the default comparer. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Generic.BoxCompare#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.boxcompare/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Generic.BoxCompare#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.boxcompare/vb/program.vb#1)]

para.span: 和可能有不同的行為方面和區分文化特性和區分大小寫。

span.span: and may behave differently in terms of culture-sensitivity and case-sensitivity.

para.span: 字串比較類別建議透過比較子<字串>。

span.span: For string comparisons, the class is recommended over Comparer<String>.

para.span: 屬性的類別傳回預先定義的執行個體執行字串比較和區分文化特性和區分大小寫的不同組合。

span.span: Properties of the class return predefined instances that perform string comparisons with different combinations of culture-sensitivity and case-sensitivity.

para.span: 區分大小寫和文化特性和區分全半都是相同的成員之間一致執行個體。

span.span: The case-sensitivity and culture-sensitivity are consistent among the members of the same instance.

para.span: 如需有關特定文化特性比較的詳細資訊，請參閱命名空間和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a59696b-d89b-45bd-946d-c75da4732d02)。

span.span: For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the namespace and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a59696b-d89b-45bd-946d-c75da4732d02).

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，比較型別相同的兩個物件並傳回值，指出一個物件是小於、等於還是大於另一個物件。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, performs a comparison of two objects of the same type and returns a value indicating whether one object is less than, equal to, or greater than the other.

returns.span: 帶正負號的整數，表示 和 的相對值，如下表所示。

span.span: A signed integer that indicates the relative values of and , as shown in the following table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法以提供自訂排序次序比較類型`T`。Implement this method to provide a customized sort order comparison for type `T`. ## Examples 下列範例會定義的比較子`Box`可用來代替預設比較子的物件。The following example defines a comparer of `Box` objects that can be used instead of the default comparer. 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Generic.BoxCompare#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.boxcompare/cs/program.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Generic.BoxCompare#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.boxcompare/vb/program.vb#5)]

exception.span: 型別 不實作 泛型介面或 介面。

span.span: Type does not implement either the generic interface or the interface.

para.span: 比較具有任何參考類型允許和不會產生例外狀況。

span.span: Comparing with any reference type is allowed and does not generate an exception.

para.span: Null 參考，會被視為小於任何不是 null 的參考。

span.span: A null reference is considered to be less than any reference that is not null.

para.span: 如需特定文化特性的比較資訊，請參閱命名空間和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a59696b-d89b-45bd-946d-c75da4732d02)。

span.span: For information on culture-specific comparisons, see the namespace and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a59696b-d89b-45bd-946d-c75da4732d02).

summary.span: 傳回泛型引數指定之型別的預設排序次序比較子 (Comparer)。

span.span: Returns a default sort order comparer for the type specified by the generic argument.

value.span: 物件，繼承 ，並用做型別 的排序次序比較子。

span.span: An object that inherits and serves as a sort order comparer for type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所傳回使用泛型介面 (`IComparable`在 C# 中，`IComparable(Of T)`在 Visual Basic 中) 來比較兩個物件。The returned by this property uses the generic interface (`IComparable` in C#, `IComparable(Of T)` in Visual Basic) to compare two objects. 如果型別`T`未實作泛型介面，這個屬性會傳回使用介面。If type `T` does not implement the generic interface, this property returns a that uses the interface. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來取得執行預設的比較的物件。The following example shows how to use the property to get an object that performs the default comparison. 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Generic.BoxCompare#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.boxcompare/cs/program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Generic.BoxCompare#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.boxcompare/vb/program.vb#3)]

para.span: 屬性的類別傳回預先定義的執行個體執行字串比較和區分文化特性和區分大小寫的不同組合。

span.span: Properties of the class return predefined instances that perform string comparisons with different combinations of culture-sensitivity and case-sensitivity.

para.span: 區分大小寫和文化特性和區分全半都是相同的成員之間一致執行個體。

span.span: The case-sensitivity and culture-sensitivity are consistent among the members of the same instance.

para.span: 如需有關特定文化特性比較的詳細資訊，請參閱命名空間和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a59696b-d89b-45bd-946d-c75da4732d02)。

span.span: The first object to compare.
The second object to compare.

summary.span: 比較兩個物件並傳回值，指出其中一個物件為小於、等於或大於另一個物件。

span.span: Compares two objects and returns a value indicating whether one is less than, equal to, or greater than the other.

returns.span: 帶正負號的整數，表示 和 的相對值，如下表所示。

span.span: A signed integer that indicates the relative values of and , as shown in the following table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是包裝函式方法，因此`obj`必須轉換成泛型引數所指定的型別`T`目前執行個體。This method is a wrapper for the method, so `obj` must be cast to the type specified by the generic argument `T` of the current instance. 如果無法將它轉換成`T`、就會擲回。If it cannot be cast to `T`, an is thrown. 比較`null`具有任何參考類型允許和不會產生例外狀況。Comparing `null` with any reference type is allowed and does not generate an exception. 排序時，`null`會被視為小於任何其他物件。When sorting, `null` is considered to be less than any other object. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來比較兩個物件。The following example shows how to use the method to compare two objects. 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Generic.BoxCompare#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.boxcompare/cs/program.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Generic.BoxCompare#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.boxcompare/vb/program.vb#4)]
